DocAttribute.Name: EnumerationValues
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration values, which shall be listed in the referenced IfcPropertyEnumeration, if such a reference is provided.

DocAttribute.Name: EnumerationReference
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration from which a enumeration value has been selected. The referenced enumeration also establishes the unit of the enumeration value.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Each enumeration value shall be a member of the list of EnumerationValues at the referenced IfcPropertyEnumeration (if given).
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(EnumerationReference)) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* EnumerationValues | temp IN EnumerationReference.EnumerationValues)) = SIZEOF(EnumerationValues))
